attributes.action: acknowledge that public money should finance specific television programmes not broadcasters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: broadcasting is publishing using electronic media. We would not dream of subsidising Waterstones because many of its books may benefit the public. Why should we discriminate between broadcasters, it is undemocratic and results in a mediocre television service whereas a more efficient and focused employment of resources would serve the public well and help to create a major international industry.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions that ask the Prime Minister simply to "recognise" or "acknowledge" some particular point of view. You should request a specific action, such as a policy or change to legislation.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
